programme.title: Bela Lugosi Meets a Brooklyn Gorilla
programme.desc: Brooklyn buddies (Duke Mitchell, Sammy Petrillo) are stranded on an island with a mad doctor (Bela Lugosi) who turns one of them into a gorilla.

programme.title: The Ape Man
programme.desc: A doctor (Bela Lugosi) injects himself with ape fluid and turns hairy; he needs human fluid to turn back.

programme.title: Bowery at Midnight
programme.desc: Criminology Professor Brenner (Bela Lugosi) uses his soup kitchen as a front for a gang committing robberies and murders.

programme.title: Bride of the Monster
programme.desc: When Dr. Vornoff bombards a hulk with atoms, he gets Lobo, who gains monstrous powers and needs a mate.

programme.title: Plan 9 From Outer Space
programme.desc: Filmmaker Ed Wood Jr.'s laughable tale of alien invaders and resurrected corpses in the San Fernando Valley.

programme.title: Spooks Run Wild
programme.desc: Muggs (Leo Gorcey) and the East Side Kids (Bobby Jordan, Huntz Hall) run into a Dracula look-alike (Bela Lugosi) and his dwarf sidekick.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Clark finally gets a lead on the murder of an Egyptologist, but Lois tries to get the scoop before he does.

programme.title: The Bat
programme.desc: A mystery writer (Agnes Moorehead) and her friends are stalked by a faceless throat-ripper (Vincent Price) in a haunted house.

programme.title: Valley of the Dragons
programme.desc: Two men try to return to Earth after being swept into a world of cave and river people.

programme.title: Plan 9 From Outer Space
programme.desc: Filmmaker Ed Wood Jr.'s laughable tale of alien invaders and resurrected corpses in the San Fernando Valley.

programme.title: The Incredible Two-Headed Transplant
programme.desc: A mad scientist (Bruce Dern) puts the head of a homicidal maniac (Albert Cole) on the body of a large simpleton.

programme.title: H.G. Wells' Invisible Man
programme.desc: Brady provides help to a friend that gets trapped in a cave-in with a bomb that will detonate if a shadow hits it.

programme.title: The Vise
programme.desc: The exploits of Mark Saber, a one-armed Chief Inspector of Scotland Yard.

programme.title: The Vise
programme.desc: A security guard commits manslaughter and gets entangled in the police investigation. As the matter escalates, Mark Saber must put his hand to the plow.

programme.title: The Vise
programme.desc: When Mr. Wilson refuses to report a big robbery, his secretary suspects foul play and decides to enlist Mark Saber's services to find out the truth.

programme.title: The Vise
programme.desc: Mark Saber must investigate what is John Wilton's true identity and connection to England. The stakes are high and the answers can turn the latter's fortunes around.

programme.title: The Vise
programme.desc: Mark Saber must swing into action when a badly injured robbery victim ends up at an ex-con's house. Involving the police may do more harm than good.

programme.title: The Vise
programme.desc: When an unsuspecting train passenger ends up with a suitcase that can land him in serious trouble, Mark Saber must come to his rescue and solve the murder mystery connected to it.
